t:
To help with my nightmares, my psychiatrist asked me to draw my dreams.



It helped at first, but then the drawings started moving.
c:
As I started fainting, I could barely hear him saying, “It's working.”



#nightmare #psychiatrist #dreams #drawing #alive #move
